import "./Result.css"; const Result = props => { const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2, }); return (
Year Total Savings Interest (Year) Total Interest Invested Capital
{props.yearlyData.year} {formatter.format(props.yearlyData.savingsEndOfYear)} {props.yearlyData.yearlyContribution}% {props.yearlyData.yearlyInterest} {props.yearlyData.savingsEndOfYear}
) } export default Result;
